The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them is solely revenge from an unseen creature from thousands of years ago.

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s got vibes that pulls you in and reminds me of your favorite horror movies. The biggest thing to keep you watching : Keanu Reeves performance. What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have long since left Planet Earth, for adventures in the countless empires that make up the Hunting Worlds. STOCKSY / IRA LOZOVSKY / Getty Images The Huntmasters are a group of masked individuals who travels from affected planet to planet on various starships.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an attempt to catch the wave of martial arts popularity ; It borrows many characteristics from other better Ninja and Karate films such as Big trouble in Little China, and it is acted like a Schwarzenegger vehicle with low budget effects .
